com.sonyericsson.capuchin
Interface FlashDataRequestListener

public interface FlashDataRequestListener

This interface should be implemented for receiving data requests from Flash.

The implementation of this interface should be registered in a FlashImage using FlashImage.setFlashDataRequestListener(FlashDataRequestListener).


Code example of using DataRequest

DataRequest in Flash:

 .... 
 var myDataRequest = new DataRequest("greeting");
 
 myDataRequest.onLoad = function(success:Boolean){
 myMovieClip.textBox = myDataRequest.receivedText;};

 myDataRequest.request();
 ....

DataRequest in Java:

 .... 
 SampleRequestListener dataRequestListener; // implements FlashDataRequestListener
 ...
 flashImage.setFlashDataRequestListener(dataRequestListener); // register listener
 ....

After calling Flash myDataRequest.request() , the dataRequested() method will be invoked in Java:

 public synchronized void dataRequested(FlashDataRequest dr) {    
   String[] args = dr.getArgs();
   ...
   if ("greeting".equals(args[0]))
   {
       dr.setProperty("receivedText", "Hello World!");  
       dr.complete(); // will call myDataRequest.onLoad in Flash
   }
   ...
 }
 ...

Method Summary
 void dataRequested(FlashDataRequest flashDataRequest)
          This method is called when a data request is received from Flash.
 

Method Detail

dataRequested

void dataRequested(FlashDataRequest flashDataRequest)
This method is called when a data request is received from Flash.

Parameters:
flashDataRequest - the FlashDataRequest received from Flash.
